metadata.dc:author: Godoy Fernández, C
Morales Meseguer, J M
Llor Esteban, B
Nieto Munuera, J
metadata.dc:description: The aim of this work is to build a scale that permits the use of Pilowsky's Illness Behaviour Questionnaire (I.B.Q.), with a Spanish clinical population. To develop this scale we have used a global sample of 627 subjects (359 men and 286 women) from different hospitals and health units in the region of Murcia.
metadata.dc:title: Baremo del Cuestionario I.B.Q. en población clínica Española.
[Adjustment scale for the I. B. Q. questionnaire for the Spanish clinical population].
metadata.dc:publisher: Actas luso-espanolas de neurologia, psiquiatria y ciencias afines
